help:
**Available Commands:**
‚Ä¢ `!help`: Show this helpful message.

**Word tracking:**
‚Ä¢ `!words`: Show your current monthly word count.
‚Ä¢ `!words all`: Show both your monthly and all-time totals.
‚Ä¢ `!leaderboard`: Show the top writers for the current month.
‚Ä¢ `!wordcount`: During November, shows the traditional daily target word count for today.

**Word updates:**
‚Ä¢ `!words <number>`: Set your word count for this month (e.g., `!words 1500`).
‚Ä¢ `!words +<number>`: Add words to your monthly (e.g., `!words +300`).
‚Ä¢ `!words -<number>`: Subtract words from your monthly and all-time totals (e.g., `!words -200`).
     ‚Ä¢ You can add `yesterday` at the end of these commands to add it to yesterday's total. Useful when adding it past midnight on the 1st.
